name: Sigilyph
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Assault
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
